pkgmetadata.longdescription: aiohttp\_index==============`aiohttp.web <http://aiohttp.readthedocs.org/en/stable/>`__ middleware toserve index files (e.g. index.html) when static directories are requested.Usage-----.. code:: python from aiohttp import web from aiohttp_index import IndexMiddleware app = web.Application(middlewares=[IndexMiddleware()]) app.router.add_static('/', 'static')``app`` will now serve ``static/index.html`` when ``/`` is requested.Dependencies------------- Python 3.5+- `aiohttp <http://aiohttp.readthedocs.org/en/stable/>`__ (tested on 0.21.4)
